title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons appear to be too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. g. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The buttons should be of an appropriate size to ensure easy interaction. b. When the dialog comes up, the table entry for the corresponding parameter should be automatically selected. e. The preview should display the full parameter name without any cutoff. g. The size of the dialog should be optimized to accommodate methods with many parameters without appearing overly large.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Change the name of a parameter to something very long. 3. Observe that the preview of the parameter name is cut off.
